title: Unable to purchase runes
body:
I've been in the process of buying all the runes and only have the seals left to purchase, but since a week or so I have not been able to buy any additional runes. when I try to buy a rune this message pops up " An error has occurred. you have reached the maximum amount for this item. please reach out to support (https://support.riothames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for further assistance. I have tried going onto this website but the webpage cannot be reached. I have enough IP to purchase the rune I was attempting to buy. I have also waited a few days to see if it is fixed alone but no such luck as of yet. 
I've opened a ticket few days ago with no response yet. Anyone had this problem or know of a fix for this problem?

cheers.
Kenny

replies.body: You're most likely either at the maximum allowed amount of runes, or you do in fact already own as many of that rune type that you're trying to buy. If you'd like, we can go ahead and remove all tier 1 and 2 runes for you so that you can buy the others you're trying to buy. Just let me know in a reply if you'd like me to go ahead!
NVM I sent a ticket and got them to fix it :D

I know this is about a month ago you said that reply but is there anyway you could help me by deleting my tier 1 and 2 runes as well? I'v hit the max runes and theres a sale on with all runes down 98%. PLEZ halp. (seriously help :( )
Same issue for me, please delete all my level 1 and 2 runes as soon as possible.

ya same issue, I was able to buy most of the runes but I can't purchase some of the Seals, mostly the scaling ones. I really want my seals of scaling Health :(

I also get the same error as well
Same issue for me, please delete all my level 1 and 2 runes as soon as possible.

I have just had a reply to my Ticket, and they have done as you suggested, they deleted my lower tier runes to make way for more powerful runes. Problem has been solved and I have managed to purchase the more powerful runes now. thanks again!

Hey Broporo, 

I knew I could only have up to 9 per rune but I didn't realize there is a maximum amount of runes I am allowed in total, I definitely do not have that type of rune in my inventory. If removing my tier 1 and 2 runes will fix the problem then please go ahead and remove them please. 

Thank you for your help
